title: In Memory of J. I. Packer
author: Collin Hansen
dc:creator: Collin Hansen
description: Originally released on July 17th, 2020, in this special episode of 'Life and Books and Everything,' Kevin DeYoung, Collin Hansen, and Justin Taylor remember their friend J. I. Packer as they share about his influence broadly and personally.
